I have 800 hours on Playstation and this game is incredible. The only complaint is the bugs, really, but that could be solved if the team wasn't updating the game and adding so much new content all the time. This game has a grind, and the biggest issue is the community being toxic no matter what the devs do. Overall 9/10, my favorite game of all time

Balance is not good, however developers are working on making it better, so this will probably be outdated (hopefully soon). It's the best game for 4v1 on steam, since evil dead is on another plataform and we cant really play it here. Still, i like the direction the game is taking. It's becoming more fair, less buggy and they already said they're doing something about the cheater problem. 
The community is toxic though. *specially survivors*

Its fun, Its a neat game especially when you're in the mood to be scared or to play tactic wise... the only downside is that the game tends to be a bit killer sided and sometimes reward killers for toxic play styles (camping and tunneling) ...
